section_text: 97 1 . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .  4 Schedule 10 to this Act has effect with respect to local tribunals, Commissioners and others officiating or attending for the purposes of this Part of this Act.

158 1 This Act may be cited as the Social Security (Northern Ireland) Act 1975. 2 Subject to subsection (2A) below, this Act extends to Northern Ireland only. 2A Section 123(2) above extends to Great Britain as well as Northern Ireland. 3 Subject to section 3(5) of the  Social Security (Consequential Provisions) Act 1975, this Act comes into force on 6th April 1975.
